NK103(pe)011:1: // byang chub sems kyi man ngag nges par lung bstan pa bzhugs //
NK103(pe)011:3: b+ho d+hi tsit+ta a hamrat+nat+wat+parasam+pa ta+aa ng+hi gasmri tisro taa
NK103(pe)011:4: b+h+ya ba ha ra u pa d+he shani sh+tsa tab+h+ya
NK103(pe)011:7: gzhi'i don lnga byang chub kyi semsrang gigter lam bzang
NK103(pe)011:8: rtsol gyi chos bzhi gtad pa rtsol bral mthar thug
NK103(pe)011:9: gi chos gsum phun kha sum tshogs pa thob padran
NK103(pe)011:10: ka pa rgyun du longs spyod pa'i thabs kyi yon
NK103(pe)011:11: tan gyi chos gnyis man ga ngag nges don snying
NK103(pe)011:12: po nyag gcig nges ca parlung nga bstan cha pazhes
NK103(pe)011:13: bya ba 'bru bshad par dam bcas gnan no////bcom ldan
NK103(pe)011:14: 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
NK103(pe)011:15: lo // 'khor 'das kyi chos kun yul med par
NK103(pe)011:16: rang gsal de ka mtshan nyid rang rig pa'i ye
NK103(pe)011:17: shes de nyid kyi rnam pa cir yang ma 'gags
NK103(pe)011:18: par yongs su gsal bar snang /
NK103(pe)011:19: rang bzhin ngos par ngos gzung thams cad las 'das
NK103(pe)011:20: pa rnams mtshan nyid ma 'dres la ye shes su
NK103(pe)011:21: rdzogs pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
NK103(pe)011:22: de nyid lam gyis ma bcos par ji ltar bar rang shar ba ni chos sku /
NK103(pe)011:23: rang rig bde chen du kun mkhyen pa nyid 'khor
NK103(pe)011:24: sa la gnas pa'i sems dpa' la ston pa rigs
NK103(pe)011:25: lngar gnas 'og min du bstan pa ni longs sku
NK103(pe)011:26: // 'chad pa'i skyes bu rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs
NK103(pe)011:27: las gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje'i
NK103(pe)011:28: thugs rje yis shar ba ni sprul pa'i sku des
NK103(pe)011:29: byin gyis brlabs pa las dga' rab rdo rje snang
NK103(pe)011:31: de ltar phyag btsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa sku
NK103(pe)011:32: lnga mtshon tshul ma 'dres la ngo bo dbyer med
NK103(pe)011:33: du yongs su rdzogs pa de la 1ji ltar du
NK103(pe)011:34: 'dud na rang bzhin dmigs 3med mtshan nyid kun gsal
NK103(pe)011:35: rnam pa rang snang du 2'dud pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:36: 'khor 'das kyi chos kun gyi rang bzhin spros pa
NK103(pe)011:37: dang bral bas byang de'i ngang las rnam pa cir
NK103(pe)011:38: yang ma 'gags par 'char bas chub ba de ltar
NK103(pe)011:39: mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rang gsal bas sems rang gi
NK103(pe)011:40: sems che ba'i yon tan brjod bya zad pa med
NK103(pe)011:41: pa'i bang mdzod du gyur pa gter de rgyal ba
NK103(pe)011:42: sku lnga brgyud nas rang la gnas par gtad pas
NK103(pe)011:43: rtogs pa'i dgos pa don de la dus rgyun tu
NK103(pe)011:44: ngang ma brjed par dran cing rig pas goms par
NK103(pe)011:45: longs spyod pas / nying dgos rang byung ye nas
NK103(pe)011:46: gnas pa rtogs goms kyi ngang des thob pa'i sku
NK103(pe)011:47: phun gsum 'gro ba'i don rtsol bas ma btsal bar
NK103(pe)011:48: lhun grub tu rdzogs par ye nas gnas pa'i rang
NK103(pe)011:49: bzhin de ngang gis mthar phyin pa ni tshogs pa'o
NK103(pe)011:50: longs spyod pas / // tshegs chung la don chen
NK103(pe)011:51: po 'grub pa'i man ngag sgro skur dang bral bar
NK103(pe)011:52: sa lung brjod bya'i don mthun pas nges pa de
NK103(pe)011:53: rjod byed bstan pa'i thabs kyis rtogs 'brel pa par
NK103(pe)011:54: 'gyur bas de ngo bo chos nyid yin pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)011:55: longs spyod pas / // bstan par bya'o // thams
NK103(pe)011:56: cad 'byung bas gzhi nyid don lngar ye nas gnas
NK103(pe)011:57: longs spyod pas / // bstan par bya'o // pa
NK103(pe)011:58: ni // 'jam dpal ye shes rdo la gser bzhin
NK103(pe)011:59: longs spyod pas / // bstan par bya'o // pa
NK103(pe)011:60: ni // las / chos la chos kyi snying por
NK103(pe)011:61: gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i snying po nyid /
NK103(pe)011:64: rang gi sems nyid yon tan mi zad pa'i gter chen por gnas so //
NK103(pe)011:65: yin lugs de lta bu yin mod kyang de ltar
NK103(pe)011:66: ngo ma shes shing bdag tu brtags pa'i rgyu las
NK103(pe)011:67: // nyon mongs pa lnga dang las gsum gyi rkyen
NK103(pe)011:68: kyis 'bras bu sdug bsngal sna tshogs su gnas shing
NK103(pe)011:69: // // dus thog ma dang tha ma med par 'khor bar 'khyams pa la //
NK103(pe)011:70: shes bya kun mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa
NK103(pe)011:71: la thams cad ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pas
NK103(pe)011:72: // sems can rnams bden par mi gnas la 'khrul
NK103(pe)011:73: pa'i blo la ji ltar brtags pa ltar du grub
NK103(pe)011:74: // par gzigs te // grub pa med pa la
NK103(pe)011:75: dngos por 'dzin pa ni ya mtshan can yin te
NK103(pe)011:76: // par gzigs te // // dper na bus pa
NK103(pe)011:77: rnams rang gis blos thag pa la sbrul du brtags
NK103(pe)011:78: pa la rang skrag pa ltar ro //
NK103(pe)011:79: rang bzhin skye 'gag med pa'i rgyun kun la khyab
NK103(pe)011:80: shugs kyis byin rlabs 'gag med du snang ba dang
NK103(pe)011:81: // bskul bas thugs dam rjes su dran pa dang
NK103(pe)011:82: gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus la bab tshe thugs rje
NK103(pe)011:83: // skyes nas // sna tshogs pa'i theg pa gdul bya'i blo dang 'tsham pas don mdzad pa na //
NK103(pe)011:84: thun mong du spong 'gegs kyi gnyen po tshar gcod
NK103(pe)011:85: pa dang sbyong ba dang sgyur ba dang dbang du
NK103(pe)011:86: sdud pa rnams // rdzogs par bstan nas /
NK103(pe)011:87: bcud 'dus pas snying po ma bcos pas rnal ma nyid //
NK103(pe)011:88: ngo shes pa'i ngang du gnas pas rtsol bas ma btsal bar 'khrul pa rang grol ba'i //
NK103(pe)011:89: bstan pa 'byung ba'i dus nyon mongs zhes drang /
NK103(pe)011:90: gsum tshan gnyis la bab pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)011:91: dam pa yang sprul thugs rjes gzung bar bya ba'i yul dang phrad pa ni ji ltar na //
NK103(pe)011:92: sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas chen du //
NK103(pe)011:93: bzang skyong lha yi sras lnga brgya dang rtsa gcig gi thu bor //
NK103(pe)011:94: sku skye ba bzhes pa'i kun dga' snying po bya
NK103(pe)011:95: ba sems lhag pa'i rtags lus gcig pu ngag gi
NK103(pe)011:97: rmi lam gyi mthangs su thub drug thim pa ni yang sprul snang nus pa dang /
NK103(pe)011:98: lha gsum zos pa ni dug gsum rang grol nas byang chub tu rdzogs pa dang //
NK103(pe)011:99: bum pa 'khyil ba'i steng du gnas pa ni dus
NK103(pe)011:100: matha'i skad cig mas mthar thug gi sar gshegs pa
NK103(pe)011:101: dang / nyi zla thogs pa ni lo ka'i sgron ma mdzad //
NK103(pe)011:102: pa'i rtags dang bzhi snang ste rang dang rigs mthun pa'i ston pa lha'i dbang po la //
NK103(pe)011:103: rmi lam de dag bsnyad pas /
NK103(pe)011:104: brgya byin gyi bka' drin gyis //
NK103(pe)011:105: ye shes can phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la gnad nas gsung gi zhes pas bskul bas //
NK103(pe)011:106: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i chos nyid ni dpe nam mkha' lta bu la //
NK103(pe)011:107: thugs rje chen po'i ye shes ni dpe nyi ma shar ba lta bu snang nas bka' bgros te //
NK103(pe)011:108: rgyal tshab longs sku mi bskyod rdo rje la //
NK103(pe)011:109: bka' yi bgro ba mthun par mgrin gcig tu /
NK103(pe)011:110: dus gsum zhes pa nyer gnyis kyis bskur ba'i sgra sbyar bas //
NK103(pe)011:111: rang bzhin ye nas gnas pa'i don mngon du mdzad pa'i thugs ye shes las //
NK103(pe)011:112: thugs rje'i rang bzhin gyi sprul pa'i sku phyag na rdo rje 'chang //
NK103(pe)011:113: ba phyung ste de yang sprul pa'i sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
NK103(pe)011:114: gnyis ka'i phyag g.yas na rtse mo lnga ldan pa'i rdo rje dang /
NK103(pe)011:116: pa'i don ni ye shes kyi mkhyen pas bar du
NK103(pe)011:117: gcod pa'i bdud 'joms shing rgyun du gcod pa dang
NK103(pe)011:118: // nyon mongs pa rang ye shes su 'bar ba'i rtsal gyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa sgrogs //
NK103(pe)011:119: sku'i gzi byin gyis las las grub pa'i gnod sbyin gos sngon po can rnams 'dul //
NK103(pe)011:120: ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gnyis med ye shes zhes pa bzhis skabs kyis gsang bdag bskul ba las //
NK103(pe)011:122: gnod sbyin 'dul ba gsang ba'i mnga' bdag pos //
NK103(pe)011:123: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa drug gis bgro bar zhal gyis bzhes nas //
NK103(pe)011:124: phyogs shar lho nub byang bzhir rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa rgyal ba bzhi la //
NK103(pe)011:125: rwa chod bsal ba'i phyir shes bya gzhi dang bsgrub bya 'bras bu'i don la //
NK103(pe)011:126: gzhi skye 'gag 'bras bu 'char tshul gzung 'dzin byung
NK103(pe)011:127: tshul 'gro don 'grub tshul gyi the tsom bzhi bcad
NK103(pe)011:129: kun rig rnam par snang mdzad nyid dgongs pa chos
NK103(pe)011:130: sku la mdzad pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang
NK103(pe)011:131: ba // rigs thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan spyi dpal dam pa des //
NK103(pe)011:132: 'dus pa'i zhes pa gsum gyis rtsol bral sa la bskul bas gleng bslang ba de nas //
NK103(pe)011:133: sems dpa' rdo rje stan las langs te gus pas
NK103(pe)011:134: khyod ni zhes pa bdun gyis zhu bar 'dun par
NK103(pe)011:135: byas te zhus lan 'dren ma'i rjod byed kyis //
NK103(pe)011:136: brjod par bya ba'i don gyi bstan /
NK103(pe)011:137: dbang klong la sogs pa klong dgu //
NK103(pe)011:138: yang don gyi gnas lugs las 'khrul pa'i tshul dang
NK103(pe)011:139: rtogs pa dang gnas thabs dang grol ba 'bras bu
NK103(pe)011:140: dang // rtsa ba'i rgyud lngar dril nas ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs par gsungs so //
NK103(pe)011:141: gnod 'dul gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag des //
NK103(pe)011:142: mthar thug ston pa'i rgyud rnams kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje tshig gis mtshams sbyar te bsdus nas //
NK103(pe)011:143: gdul bya dam pa yang sprul dpa' bo byin gyis brlabs pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:144: lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum du mchod rten bum
NK103(pe)011:145: pa 'khyil pa'i thog 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba'i
NK103(pe)011:146: steng du gzhag / rgyal thabs spyi blugs yongs su
NK103(pe)011:147: rdzogs par dbang bskur bas rtsol bcas kyi dbang kun
NK103(pe)011:149: rtsol med kyi bstan pa lha'i gnas 'og min dga' ldan rtsa gsum dang gsum du rgyas pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:150: shing 'dzam bu yod pa'i chu'i gling na rnal ma'i snod dang ldan pa la bcud dang bral bar //
NK103(pe)011:151: gzigs nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang gis //
NK103(pe)011:152: mthar thug gi sa pa sprul pa sku'i rang bzhin can //
NK103(pe)011:153: lha sems lhag can las grol ba de h'u du bsdus nas thugs kar btsud //
NK103(pe)011:154: de ngang par sprul nas babs te 'dzam bu'i gling
NK103(pe)011:155: u rgyan gyi yul na skyon bral sgyu spangs pa'i
NK103(pe)011:156: mtshan can lcam go ma la'i //
NK103(pe)011:157: thugs las mchu yis bshos nas thugs sras sku'i la lhums su bzhag /
NK103(pe)011:158: pa'i lo dus na dpal bo sh+aakya'i rigs bzhad par
NK103(pe)011:159: mdzad pa rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che 'don
NK103(pe)011:160: pa zhig bltams // lho nub dam shod gling gi dur khrod du //
NK103(pe)011:161: gsang bdag byon nas dbang bskur dang bstan pa bshad pa'i tshul tsam bstan //
NK103(pe)011:162: te dngos su lha yul du mdzad do //
NK103(pe)011:163: dur khrod kyi ma mo dang las kyi gshin rje la //
NK103(pe)011:164: dam tshig stsal nas bka' dang bstan pa srung ba'i las la bsgo ba mdzad //
NK103(pe)011:165: u rgyan d+ha na ko sha'i yul rdo rje can 'i phug gi gnas su //
NK103(pe)011:166: brjod bya klong dgu don dang tshig gi shwa lo ka sum brgya /
NK103(pe)011:167: rjod byed bam po nyi khri bsdus so //
NK103(pe)011:168: kho bo bram ze snying po grub pa la rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis lo rgyus sbyar //
NK103(pe)011:169: byin gyis brlabs dbang bskur te dbul po rang gter zhes pa bzhis lung bstan nas //
NK103(pe)011:170: bla ma dam pa dga' rab de la 'dun pa yis tshol du phyin pa las //
NK103(pe)011:171: ye shes kyi rigs can gyi mkha' 'gro ma gsum gyis //
NK103(pe)011:172: chu bo'i zhes pa bzhis brdas bskul ba byin rlabs dang ldan par byas nas //
NK103(pe)011:173: dam pa ga la ba rdo rje'i phug der phyin te bgres par bzhugs pa la //
NK103(pe)011:174: 'dun par byas pas snod brtags shing brdas spyos tha mar mkhar chen ces pa'i brda'i don bkrol te //
NK103(pe)011:175: yang na rgyal ba ngang tu 'gro gnyis zer ba'i zam pa chad pa la //
NK103(pe)011:176: rna brgyud rdo rje'i zam pa btsugs nas //
NK103(pe)011:177: po zos na ni cher 'gyangs kyi sgras so //
NK103(pe)011:178: yang na skye ba brgyud pa lan grangs 'gas //
NK103(pe)011:179: duhkha las rang grol ba'i thabs rtsol med kyi bde ba chen po rang la gnas par gtad pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:180: rang grol bde chen de'i don rtogs pa'i so las gzhan du ma 'das par //
NK103(pe)011:181: rtogs pa'i ngang la mi rmongs te ma brjed par
NK103(pe)011:182: dran pa'i 'du byed sems pa yis nyams su blang
NK103(pe)011:183: ba ni // snying po'i don la skye 'gag gnas
NK103(pe)011:184: gsum rang grol te rgyu rkyen gyis 'dus ma byas
NK103(pe)011:185: ba ni // par // dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i shes bya thams cad ma lus par rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)011:186: skad cig ma'i mtha' la mi gnas te skye 'gag med pa'i rgyun dang bcas //
NK103(pe)011:187: te bar ma chad pas dus gsum gyi dum bu'i mthar ma red pa'i //
NK103(pe)011:188: de ltar 'dus ma byas de'i ngang du blo gnas
NK103(pe)011:189: na bsgrub bya'i don mthar son par 'gyur bas na
NK103(pe)011:190: dpe chu'i rgyun ma chad par gnas pa dang 'dra
NK103(pe)011:191: bar blo ched du ma gtad pa'i ngang du sdod
NK103(pe)011:192: cig pa'o // dper na rnam shes tshogs drug thog
NK103(pe)011:193: ma med pa nas bar ma chad pas 'khor lo
NK103(pe)011:195: gzugs sogs yul drug la dus mtshungs par longs spyod pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)011:196: rtogs pa lta ba ni rtog med la dgos pa 'byung bas rin 2chen nor 1bu la /
NK103(pe)011:198: 3 / de'i ngang du gnas pas de nyid la goms par longs spyad pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:199: tshul bzang po'i rtsol bas goms par byed pa lam
NK103(pe)011:200: gyi chos gtan pa dran pa rgyun du longs spyod
NK103(pe)011:201: pa bzhi'o // rgyu rkyen med pas rang byung gi
NK103(pe)011:202: dpal sku gsum dang ldan par ye nas gnas pa
NK103(pe)011:203: pa bzhi'o // la // 'brel pa stes dbang tsam
NK103(pe)011:204: te ci zhig ltar las rtogs goms kyi rkyen bzhi
NK103(pe)011:205: 'dzom pas 'bras bu rang las shar ba de la
NK103(pe)011:206: pa bzhi'o // la // // rnyed ces pa dang
NK103(pe)011:207: thob ces pa ni rang gnas kyi mngon du gyur
NK103(pe)011:208: pas don ldan gyi ming yin la sngar med ma
NK103(pe)011:209: thob pas 'dod rgyal gyi ming can du'ang 'gyur ro
NK103(pe)011:211: thob ces pa de ni 'khrul pa rang grol ba
NK103(pe)011:212: la brdas de skad ces mtshon pa tsam du zad
NK103(pe)011:214: rig pa'i ye shes ngos gzung gang yang med par
NK103(pe)011:216: pa la // ye nas rang lam gyis ma bcos
NK103(pe)011:217: pa ni chos kyi sku'i ngang //
NK103(pe)011:218: chos sku de yis shes bya kun yul med du
NK103(pe)011:219: mkhyen pa nyid du mnga' mdzad pa ni nyid longs
NK103(pe)011:220: sku ste // de'i shugs las sa la gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)011:221: rig 'dzin byang sems sgrol ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs su
NK103(pe)011:222: shar ba ni gzhan longs sku'o //
NK103(pe)011:223: spros pa dang bral bas thugs thams cad la khyab
NK103(pe)011:224: pas rje chen po'i rnam pa cir yang snang ba
NK103(pe)011:225: nyid // thub pa drug dag 1pa dang 'khor lor
NK103(pe)011:226: rgyun ma dag 1 pa rgyun gyi sprul pa'i sku
NK103(pe)011:227: gsum dang mtshon tshul nas ma 'dres la ngo bo
NK103(pe)011:228: dbyer med du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phun sum nyid
NK103(pe)011:229: nyid // du // tshogs pa ni gcig shos lam la rag las pa'i //
NK103(pe)011:230: dpe ni rin chen rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas mchod pas 'dod yon phab pas //
NK103(pe)011:231: 'gro ba'i dbul ba sel zhing bde bar longs spyod pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)011:232: nyes pas ma gos rtsol bas ma btsal phyogs su ma lhungs par //
NK103(pe)011:233: bdag gzhan gnyis ka chos kyi don bzhi lhun gyis grub pas gzhan las rmad du byung ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)011:234: rtsol ba dang bral ba ni mthar thug 'bras bu'i chos sku gsum po de yin no //
NK103(pe)011:235: mtshan nyid theg pa ltar bskal pa grangs med par
NK103(pe)011:236: sbyong ba dang sngags phyi nang bskyed rdzogs kyi rtsol
NK103(pe)011:237: bas lam dang du len cing //
NK103(pe)011:238: nyon mongs pa gnyen pos spong ba dang 'gegs pa
NK103(pe)011:239: la sogs pa'i las 'du byed kyi bya byed las
NK103(pe)011:240: grol nas // tshegs med par bsgrub bya'i don chen po 'bras bu'i bde bar gnas pa'i //
NK103(pe)011:241: thabs kyi theg pa la'ang thabs chen por gyur pa'i gdams pas dgrol bar byed pa'i man ngag go //
NK103(pe)011:242: rjes dpag gi rtags sam mngon sum bzhis mngon sum du skye lugs gsum med par ma mthong yang //
NK103(pe)011:243: zhen pa'i blos yod par sgro ma btags //
NK103(pe)011:244: rang bzhin spros bral mtshan nyid ye shes rnam pa sgyu ma can //
NK103(pe)011:245: ye nas gnas pa de rtog dpyod kyis med par
NK103(pe)011:246: ma spangs te sgro skur dang bral bas lung ngo
NK103(pe)011:247: // 'bras bu thob pa'i thabs lam kyi rgyan nas
NK103(pe)011:248: yon tan gyi chos man ngag dang lung gnyis so
NK103(pe)011:249: // // don rtogs pa'i thabs su tshig gi tha snyad cir yang mtshon mod kyang //
NK103(pe)011:250: bden pa'i don du dril na rang rig pa'i ye shes rang 'od kyi rnam pa gsal ba nyid //
NK103(pe)011:251: kyi rang bzhin snying po mu matha'i phyogs ris kun
NK103(pe)011:252: dang bral ba gsum mtshon tshul ma 'dres la ngo
NK103(pe)011:254: brjod bya thams cad thig le nyag gcig nyid du don mthun pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:255: nges par bden pa'i shes bsgrub kyi don snying po
NK103(pe)011:256: rnam pa bgrang du med pas nyag gcig yin mod
NK103(pe)011:257: // 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bdag ni bskal pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas //
NK103(pe)011:258: rang la gnas pa'i gter dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i yid sbyin gyi rin chen dang bral ba la //
NK103(pe)011:259: bla ma dam pa gzhan las mchog tu gyur pa
NK103(pe)011:260: yang sprul gis rang gi gter gtad pa'am stsal bas
NK103(pe)011:261: // bde bas dbul ba'i duhkha sel nas rtsol med
NK103(pe)011:262: kyi bde ba dang ldan pas bdag la sku drin
NK103(pe)011:263: // che'o // rtogs pas rang nyid dpal du 'bar te 'od gsal bas na //
NK103(pe)011:264: dngos kyi bu lha'i rgyal po dang brgyud pa'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro bskal ldan gang dag la //
NK103(pe)011:265: rang gis rtogs pa'i don de legs par sbyin cing
NK103(pe)011:266: ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bas 'khrul pa las
NK103(pe)011:268: shes bsgrub kyi snying po gnas lugs kyi don lnga la rtogs goms kyi blo gnas pa gces te //
NK103(pe)011:269: lam gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i don sbyang bgrod kyi
NK103(pe)011:270: rtsol ba dang bral ba 'bras bu'i chos sku gsum
NK103(pe)011:271: ni che'o // 'on kyang 'bras bu la yon tan
NK103(pe)011:272: yod de 'grub pa'i thabs lam bzang rtsol gyi chos
NK103(pe)011:273: ni che'o // kyis // de la gnas par ma
NK103(pe)011:274: nus na 'bras bu'i yon tan la mkhas pas ngag
NK103(pe)011:275: tu brjod kyang mi 'grub pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:276: dper na nor bu rin chen gyi yon tan rnams
NK103(pe)011:277: ngag tu brjod kyang dgos 'dod mi 'byung ba dang
NK103(pe)011:279: skyon des na lam bzang rtsol gyi chos gong du bshad pa bzhi la //
NK103(pe)011:280: tshegs chung ngus don chen 'grub pa'i man ngag dang
NK103(pe)011:281: sgro skur dang bral ba'i lung gi rgyan gyis spras
NK103(pe)011:282: nas // nges pa'i don gyi snying por nyag gcig tu don dril la bstan no //
NK103(pe)011:283: lha las bar chad med par bde bar mi yul du 'ongs legs par 'ongs //
NK103(pe)011:284: chos bzhi po de las yang rang gi gter gtad pa'i gtam rgyud ni //
NK103(pe)011:285: sngar bkod pa nyid du rdzogs par bshad par zad do //
NK103(pe)011:286: don rtogs pa'i so las ma 'das par dran pa'i rtogs thabs ni //
NK103(pe)011:287: shes bya rnam shes tshogs brgyad yul brgyad dang bcas pa la //
NK103(pe)011:288: shes byed spong ba dang 'gegs pa'i tshul du blo zhugs te rtog pas brtags pa yi //
NK103(pe)011:289: rang rang gi 'dod pa'i phyogs rer 'then pa'i sgra
NK103(pe)011:290: dang tshad ma dang rigs pa dang gsum gyi tha
NK103(pe)011:291: snyad las // grol ba ni rgyal ba'i lung dang bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas //
NK103(pe)011:292: ma nor bar legs par 'ongs pa'i rang rig pa'i nyams tshad ma'o //
NK103(pe)011:293: des brlan brjod bya'i don la rjod byed kyi sgras mtshon na //
NK103(pe)011:294: las mthun pas mthun par snang ba'i don la dmigs te mthun par grags pa las byung ba'i sgras //
NK103(pe)011:295: rgyud la lhings kyis mngon par zhen pa'i brda de ngag tu rjod pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:296: gzhi mtha' yi ge'i don gyi bye brag nyid bstan pas khong du chud par byas nas //
NK103(pe)011:297: yi ge de 'dus pa'i gnas skabs las ngo bo mtshon pa'i ming 1du dril la //
NK103(pe)011:298: de 1'dus pa las khyad par mtshon pa'i tshig de
NK103(pe)011:299: 'dus pa las 'jug ldog mtshon pa'i ngag don du
NK103(pe)011:300: dril lo // de yang mthar thug gi chos nyid rang stong mtshan nyid gsal rnam pa 'od //
NK103(pe)011:301: bden pa'i don lhun grub gsum po de dang tshig 'brel grub sgron las /
NK103(pe)011:302: ngang tshul ji ltar gnas pa de //
NK103(pe)011:306: sgras brkyen sa de la 'gal 'gog mi mthun pa
NK103(pe)011:307: med pas 'grig pa'i rigs pas bden pa'i don 'dzin
NK103(pe)011:308: na // de la chos dang mthun par smra bas
NK103(pe)011:309: mi 'jigs pa thob pas rigs pa 'bras bu skyed
NK103(pe)011:311: tha snyad rgyu la ltos pa'am brten nas 'bras bu skye ba nyid du //
NK103(pe)011:312: mngon par grub pas de dag gi 'thad par bsgrubs pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:313: shes bya'i don gyi chos nyid don gyis rang gi ngo bo gcig /
NK103(pe)011:314: bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la //
NK103(pe)011:315: tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya gang //
NK103(pe)011:316: ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod //
NK103(pe)011:317: de phyir dngos po mthong ba yis //
NK103(pe)011:318: yon tan mtha' dag mthong ba nyid //
NK103(pe)011:320: sgro 'dogs dang bral bar mngon sum du mthong ba la //
NK103(pe)011:321: ma mthong ba'i cha shas gzhan lus pa med pas //
NK103(pe)011:322: na phyogs gcig mthong ba'i rtags la brten pas ma
NK103(pe)011:323: mthong ba rjes su dpag tu med par mngon sum
NK103(pe)011:324: pa'i tshad ma // de dang ldan pa ni rigs rgyud chig chod yin pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:325: mngon sum de las gzhan du rjes dpag gi rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i shes pa yang //
NK103(pe)011:326: shes bya kun la 'jug par nus pa yin la //
NK103(pe)011:327: de gnyis la'ang phyogs gcig pa'i snying po gang yang ma dmigs pas //
NK103(pe)011:328: de la 'jug pa'i mkhan po ni mtshan nyid rang rig ye shes yin la //
NK103(pe)011:329: shes par bya ba de nyid ni rnam pa sgyu ma yin ste //
NK103(pe)011:331: tha dad gyur nas 'brel pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:332: mkhas pa nam yang mi 'dod la //
NK103(pe)011:334: de gnyis ma 'brel na shes bya shes par mi 'thad la tha dad 'brel pa'ang mi 'thad pas //
NK103(pe)011:335: rang bzhin spros pa'i dmigs pa kun las grol ba rnams //
NK103(pe)011:336: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i spyi'i rnam pa tsam rjes su dpag go //
NK103(pe)011:337: bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i shes rab gnyis kyis rtogs
NK103(pe)011:338: pa rgyun bsring zhing khyad par du bskyed pas drang
NK103(pe)011:339: // de yi rang bzhin de yin pas tha mi dad pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)011:340: khyab pa zhes bya 'brel pa zhes bya /
NK103(pe)011:343: khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid du bas //
NK103(pe)011:345: med na mi 'byung bar nges pa zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)011:346: phal cher rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs de la brten dgos te //
NK103(pe)011:347: phyin ci log gi stobs dang nus pa dang rtsal thog ma med pa nas rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)011:348: rtogs thabs de yang yi ge dang ming dang tshig gis //
NK103(pe)011:349: don mtshon kyang sgra de la don mi gnas pas //
NK103(pe)011:350: mtshon bya'i don rang rig pa'i steng du gzhag ste //
NK103(pe)011:351: snyan khung brgyud pa'i gdams pas gnad du phab ste don bstan pas rtogs pa //
NK103(pe)011:352: de yi so la ma yengs par gnas pa'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)011:353: de ltar rtogs pa la the tshom med par yid
NK103(pe)011:354: ches nas thag chod de nges pa ma nor ba'i
NK103(pe)011:355: ngos zin pa'i // ngang ma shor bar sos lam rim le'u gnyis pa las /
NK103(pe)011:356: de ltar don mthong zhes drang /
NK103(pe)011:358: nges par de la 'dris chen du goms pa'i gdeng la gnas //
NK103(pe)011:359: de las mi 'da' bar de'i ngang du bsdam pa'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)011:360: yul la mtshan ma 1ru 'dzin pa'i sgo lnga'i shes
NK103(pe)011:361: pa dang de'i rjes 2su ming la spros pa skye
NK103(pe)011:362: ba yid dang // kun gzhi la nyon yid 3nger
NK103(pe)011:363: 'dzin cing phung po lhag ma la gzhan du rtog
NK103(pe)011:364: pa'i shes pa'i rgyun lang can de dag /
NK103(pe)011:365: kha 'byam gyi lta ba'am don spyir bltas pa tsam min par //
NK103(pe)011:366: rnam pa sgyu 1ma rang bzhin spros 2bral mtshan nyid rang 3rig par //
NK103(pe)011:367: thug phrad pa nyid du ma bsgoms pa'i mngon sum pas thal byung bas //
NK103(pe)011:368: yul ming sems gsum la btur zhing bsgoms pa'i mngon sum yas dras thag gcad //
NK103(pe)011:369: skye lugs gsum rang log nas sku gsum du thug
NK103(pe)011:370: phrad pa'i rang sor gzhag thabs gsum gyis gzhag go
NK103(pe)011:371: // rtogs pa de nyid dran pa rgyun chags kyi man ngag gis gnas pa la //
NK103(pe)011:372: stong pa dang gsal ba dang rol pa'i rgyun te //
NK103(pe)011:373: shes bya phyi snod dang nang bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams //
NK103(pe)011:374: 'di kho na'o zhes nges par brtag par dka' bas //
NK103(pe)011:375: rang bzhin cir yang grub pa med par gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:376: stong pa nyid ye nas rgyun du gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:377: stong pa de mkhyen pa ni rang rig pa'i ye shes yin te //
NK103(pe)011:378: shes bya kun gsal ba'i nyi ma 'od po che //
NK103(pe)011:379: de skad cig kyang 'gag ma myong bar gsal ba ni //
NK103(pe)011:380: kun mkhyen gyi ye shes rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:381: stong gsal de yi rol pa ni 'byung ba lnga dang //
NK103(pe)011:382: lam sa'i yon tan drod dang rtags dang mngon shes dang //
NK103(pe)011:383: rgyal ba'i zhing dang gzhal yas khang dang gdan dang //
NK103(pe)011:384: 'khor dang bstan pa dang rgyan dang stobs dang rdzu
NK103(pe)011:385: 'phrul dang ma 'dres pa dang mtshan dpe sogs par
NK103(pe)011:387: rol pa de lam du khyer ba la dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa dang //
NK103(pe)011:388: 'da' ka ma'i man ngag bar do nas //
NK103(pe)011:390: 'khrul pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gnas lugs ni rang rig dang rang 'od dang //
NK103(pe)011:391: spros bral gyi snying 11 po len 1pas 1na dal te //
NK103(pe)011:392: de yi thugs rje 'gro ba 'dul bar //
NK103(pe)011:393: rdo rje dbyings kyi dal rnams su sprul pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:394: bya ba'i rgyud dam gnyi ga'i rgyud dam rnal 'byor ram //
NK103(pe)011:395: sngags nang pa'i bskyed pa ma h+aa rdzogs pa u nu'i rten gzhi'i rkyen nyid pas //
NK103(pe)011:396: rtsa ba zhi khro gnyis 'jam dpal sku pad+ma gsung yang dag thugs bdud rtsi yon tan //
NK103(pe)011:397: phur pa phrin las 'dus pa yum gyi dbyings //
NK103(pe)011:398: mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rten gzhir dkyil 'khor de rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)011:399: bsgrub pa'ang dkyil 'khor de'i tshul du lam gyi grogs su nges pa ste de la yang //
NK103(pe)011:400: ting nges sgrub pa ni grol lam yin pas 1nang dang /
NK103(pe)011:401: skal med la gsang ba steng sgo'i rtsa dang thig
NK103(pe)011:402: le lus kyi nang na yod pas 2yang ches gsang
NK103(pe)011:403: ba 'og sgo'i bde la mi rtog pa rtogs dka'
NK103(pe)011:406: 4ji lta bar sgrub pa ni rang bzhin ma nor
NK103(pe)011:407: bas de kho na nyid dang bzhi bzhir nges par
NK103(pe)011:408: sbyar te // stong pa chen po dang snying rje
NK103(pe)011:409: sgyu ma dang yig 'bru ni phyi'i ting nge 'dzin
NK103(pe)011:410: sbyar te // gsum la // gsal la mi rtog
NK103(pe)011:411: pa gnas pas snying ka de ting 'od gsal gnas
NK103(pe)011:412: pas mgrin pa longs spyod kun ting bde ba'i rten
NK103(pe)011:413: gzhir gnas pas lte ba rgyu'i ting nge ste nang
NK103(pe)011:414: sbyar te // gsum la // // yum de stong
NK103(pe)011:415: pa dang yab kun gsal ba dang 'dres bde ba
NK103(pe)011:416: dang ldan pa'i thig le ni gsang ba'i gsum /
NK103(pe)011:417: de rang bzhin dang mtshan kun nyid dang rnam rgyu par shar bas //
NK103(pe)011:418: ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngang du gnas pa ni de kho na nyid kyi'o //
NK103(pe)011:419: 'byung ba lnga rim par brtsegs pa'i steng du gzhal
NK103(pe)011:420: yas khang khyim dang sbra gur gyi tshul du sgom
NK103(pe)011:421: pa phyi // phung po dur khrod kyi gzhal yas dang dbang po sgo lnga rim brtsegs /
NK103(pe)011:423: sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri //
NK103(pe)011:424: rim pa bzhin du nam mkha' rlung //
NK103(pe)011:425: me chu sa'i yin zhes so //
NK103(pe)011:427: yum gyi mkha' gsang ba rdo rje rten pa'i gnas
NK103(pe)011:428: las bzhi'i dbyibs dang ldan pa ni gsang ba'i 'o
NK103(pe)011:429: // lhun gnas bde ba chen po dang ldan pa ni de kho na'o nyid kyi gnas khang ngo //
NK103(pe)011:430: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang zhal dang ldan pa'i sku phyag rgya sgom pa ni phyi'i lha //
NK103(pe)011:431: rtog tshogs kyi don lha'i brdar gsal ba ni nang //
NK103(pe)011:432: rtsa gnas kyi thig le bde gsal zung 'brel ni gsang ba lha'i sku //
NK103(pe)011:433: ye nas lhun gyis grub pa shes bsgrub kyi don chen po ni de kho na nyid kyi lha'o //
NK103(pe)011:434: rten thod khang ngam rat+na'i khang bu'i nang du don
NK103(pe)011:435: ye shes lnga'i rtags rigs lnga dang ldan par rdzogs
NK103(pe)011:437: khams lnga'i bcud bde stong gi ye shes kyi rgyas btab pa de //
NK103(pe)011:438: me rlung gi rkyen 1'og sgo'i stobs las byung ba ni nang 1dang gsang 1ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
NK103(pe)011:439: rang byung ye shes nyag gcig la yon tan gyi ldog cha yis ye shes lngar rgyas btab //
NK103(pe)011:440: spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang tsit+ta'i gnas su k+aa b+aa tsi'i dam tshig gsum gyi ngo bo //
NK103(pe)011:441: de pad rdo rje'i rigs gsum gyis sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa ni phyi //
NK103(pe)011:442: sgo lus ngag yid gsum bde gsal gyi don brlan
NK103(pe)011:443: pa ni nang dang gsang ba'i rten byin gyis brlab
NK103(pe)011:444: bo // yin lugs kyis rten byed pas sku brda
NK103(pe)011:445: sprad pas gsung ye nas gsal bas thugs de kho
NK103(pe)011:447: 'og min gyi gnas sam stug po bkod pa'i pho brang nas //
NK103(pe)011:448: 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po'i chos dang tshul mthun du //
NK103(pe)011:449: ye shes pa la mos pas snyan gsan dbab pa
NK103(pe)011:450: dang spyan drang ba dang dbyer med du bstim pa
NK103(pe)011:451: phyi // rkyen gyi 'khor lo me rlung gnyis bskyod pas rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi'i thig le //
NK103(pe)011:452: bzhu bas snyan gsan phab ste de'i gzi brjid g.yas
NK103(pe)011:453: ro ma dang g.yon rkyang ma dang bde ba'i lam
NK103(pe)011:454: gnyis nas // nam mkha'i ba bzho ba yis bde gsal gyi ye shes dang drod //
NK103(pe)011:455: phebs pa ni nang gi spyan drang ba yin la gsang ba'i yang rgyu yin pas //
NK103(pe)011:456: des rgyud brlan pa ni snyan gsan dbab pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:457: khams dbang yul rnam shes gsum rol pa las //
NK103(pe)011:458: nyi zla gnyis 'dres kyi bde ba gsal stong zung
NK103(pe)011:459: 'jug nyid gsang ba'i sku yin pas de nyid spyan
NK103(pe)011:460: drang ba'o // rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i man+da la dkyil 'khor //
NK103(pe)011:461: rang bzhin stong mtshan nyid gsal rnam pa'i 'od dang
NK103(pe)011:462: ldan par yongs su rdzogs par ye nas gshegs pa
NK103(pe)011:464: dang po 'du ba dang tha ma 'bral ba med
NK103(pe)011:465: par rtogs pa ni gnyis med du bstim pa'i don
NK103(pe)011:467: rang gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i don ma grub kyi bar du brtan par bzhugs pa phyi //
NK103(pe)011:468: kha zas sman dam rdzas spyod lam gyis lus gsos
NK103(pe)011:469: pas yid gsal zhing lus drod dang ldan pas lus
NK103(pe)011:471: thig le'i bde ba rgyas pas tshe ring ba dang ldan pa ni gsang ba'i brtan pa //
NK103(pe)011:472: stong gsal rang 'od rdzogs par rtogs pa las goms pas 'gyur ba med pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:473: bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa non pas de kho nyid kyi brtan pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:474: bskyed pa dam tshig gi dal dang spyan drangs ye
NK103(pe)011:475: shes kyi dal dbyer med du mos pa ni phyi'i
NK103(pe)011:476: phyag / phung po nyid drod dang bde bar gsal bar mjal ba ni nang //
NK103(pe)011:477: 'dod chags su 'dzin pa nyid ye shes su mjal ba ni gsang ba'i //
NK103(pe)011:478: rnam shes tshogs brgyad la gsal bar myong ba shes
NK103(pe)011:479: pa gsum lhun grub gsum du mjal ba de kho
NK103(pe)011:480: na'i phyag go // lha ye shes can gyi spyan snga ru //
NK103(pe)011:481: bdag khyed dang 'dra bar grol nas thabs bsam yas
NK103(pe)011:482: kyis gzhan bsgral zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar
NK103(pe)011:483: dbyung bar dam bca' ba ni phyi //
NK103(pe)011:484: rang gi lus nyid thabs kyis rdo rje ru grub pas gzhan bsgral bar dam bca' ba nang dang //
NK103(pe)011:485: rang 'dod pa'i mes tshig ba la 'dod pa'i mes
NK103(pe)011:486: mi 'ching bar gso ba la gzhan don rdzogs par
NK103(pe)011:487: dam bca' ba // yid lugs rtogs pa'i ngang du
NK103(pe)011:488: goms pas gnas shing de las mi 'da' bar dam
NK103(pe)011:489: bcas pa ni de kho na'o //
NK103(pe)011:490: rtog tshogs rnams lhar rgyas phyi btab cing der gnas su stob 1pas phyag rgya'i mchod pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:491: de 1bzhin du rtog tshogs la steng sgo'i mi rtog
NK103(pe)011:492: gsal nang ba'i ye shes kyis rgyas btab pa dang
NK103(pe)011:493: // 'og sgo'i rten nyi zla gnyis 'dres pa'i rten
NK103(pe)011:494: can bde gsal gsang stong nyid kyis rgyas btab cing
NK103(pe)011:496: rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyi gsal bar myong ba'i shes
NK103(pe)011:497: pa nga bdag spros pa mtshan mar skye ba'i nyon
NK103(pe)011:499: la rim par rang rig dang spros de kho na bral dang sgyu mas rgyas btab pas phyag rgya //
NK103(pe)011:500: de dag bde ba chen po gnas su stob pas mchod pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:501: spyod yul thams cad sems nyid du yongs su dag pas na kun tu bzang po ste de la //
NK103(pe)011:502: phyi thun mong nang khyad par gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyi mchod pa rdzogs pa'am //
NK103(pe)011:503: ye shes can dang nam mkha'i ngang ste 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'am //
NK103(pe)011:504: stong gsal bde ba'i ngang du dbul //
NK103(pe)011:505: spyod yul ma lus pa bde ba chen po'i ngang du stob par dbul lo //
NK103(pe)011:506: yon chab kyis phyag 1zhabs 1 zhal 1bsil 1 1rnams lha tshogs la bya ba ni phyi //
NK103(pe)011:507: rtsa gnas 'khor lo bzhi rkyen me rlung gyis nam mkha'i ba bzhos pas bkru ba nang //
NK103(pe)011:508: chags pa'i sred pa'i dri ma thabs kyis tshangs par dag /
NK103(pe)011:509: ma rig pa'i dri ma ye shes nyid yin pas bkru ba de kho na'o //
NK103(pe)011:510: phyi tshim 1pa sposa mdzes 2pa me tog mun pa
NK103(pe)011:511: sel 3ba mara me dri dang ldan 4pa byug pa
NK103(pe)011:512: rnams // zag pa med pa'i phung po tshul khrims la sogs pa lnga'i lha mo bzhi //
NK103(pe)011:513: gang la 'bul na bde gshegs kyi shangs 1dang dbu 2dang spyan 3dang thugs 4kar dbul //
NK103(pe)011:514: de dag gi sku mdog ser 1mthing 2dmar 3ljang 4bzhi bsnol ma yis //
NK103(pe)011:515: yang na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig pa
NK103(pe)011:516: la dang mchod pa bzhi chen po slar lan gyi
NK103(pe)011:517: tshul du bdag la thim pas dag cing grub par
NK103(pe)011:518: mdzad do // spos dri dang ldan pa'i rtsa ba'i me tog las nang gsang //
NK103(pe)011:519: thig le'i bde ba gsal bas mar me tshim par mdzad ma dri chab //
NK103(pe)011:520: gang du na steng sgo 'khor lo'i gnas sam 'og sgo yum gyi b+ha ga'i mkhar //
NK103(pe)011:521: bde gsal gyis mchod pa dang yang lan gyi tshul du rang gis nyams su myong ba'o //
NK103(pe)011:522: rtog goms kyi don dang ldan te sems dwang pas tshim par byed pa ni spos //
NK103(pe)011:523: matha'i nyes pas ma gos par shes bya kun gsal ba ni me tog pad+mara mdzes //
NK103(pe)011:524: des ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba ni snang gsal sgron me //
NK103(pe)011:525: sred pa 'khor ba'i nyes pa bsil zhing chos kyi dri dang ldan pa ni byug pa sems //
NK103(pe)011:526: yul dang sems gnyis ka ye shes su gsal bas phan tshun du mnyes pas bzhi bsnol lo //
NK103(pe)011:527: gtsang smer 'dzin pa'i bdud la dam rdzas lnga'i rtsis //
NK103(pe)011:528: tsha rims dug mdze shu thor glang thabs nad lnga
NK103(pe)011:529: sel thun mong gi dgos par tshe ring nor phyug
NK103(pe)011:530: mthu che mdangs gsal skad snyan pa lnga dang ldan
NK103(pe)011:531: // rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa lnga'i dngos grub thun mong ba byang sems la sogs pas len //
NK103(pe)011:532: chos nyid rang bzhin gyis chos can rang gi ngo bos /
NK103(pe)011:533: byin gyi rlabs kyis mthu yis grub pa bzhi yis brgyan te lha la dbul lo //
NK103(pe)011:534: lus kyi khams lnga'i snyigs ma skye ba bzhi'am chu bo bzhir skyor ba'i bdud la //
NK103(pe)011:535: bcud dwangs ma lnga'i khu bas rtsir len pa'i thabs kyis //
NK103(pe)011:536: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhir khyab pa'i rtsa gnas su mchod pa //
NK103(pe)011:537: steng ngam gsang ba'i gnas yum gyi mkha' nyid du //
NK103(pe)011:538: mi 'ching bar grol bas thabs kyi dam pa'i rtsir mchod cing bstabs pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:539: phyi sgo lnga par yid nang nyon yid don gyi la mi gnas pa'i bdud bzhi po rnams //
NK103(pe)011:540: kyi rang bzhin ma nor shes te rtogs nas de'i ngang du ma bcos par bzhag pa'i rtsir //
NK103(pe)011:541: spang bya med pas kun tu bzang po dbyer med kyi don du rgyas par mchod //
NK103(pe)011:542: dam rdzas lnga dang rta glang po che mi glang khyi'i sha lnga 'byung ba lnga'i bcud //
NK103(pe)011:543: zan rnams sbyar ba las thugs 1h'u gsung 2am +amo sku 3yi snying 123pos brlabs //
NK103(pe)011:544: chos nyid du sbyang 1ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'bar 2'dod 3pa'i lha mo drug dang ldan pa'i //
NK103(pe)011:546: gzugs 1me long sgra 2pi wam dri 3spos khang zhal
NK103(pe)011:547: zas 4na bza' 5rdo rje dril bu thogs pa rnams
NK103(pe)011:548: // don chos nyid la ye shes rtags lha la lha thim par rol lo //
NK103(pe)011:549: zag bcas kyi phung po mig la sogs pa skye mched drug bde bas /
NK103(pe)011:552: khams gsum rol pa rgyu las tshim 2par thim pa
NK103(pe)011:553: ni // bkra gsal gzugs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug nyid ye shes kyis //
NK103(pe)011:554: rtogs pa'i snying po longs pas lhun gnas bde chen
NK103(pe)011:555: gyi ngang du mnyes pa de kho na nyid yin
NK103(pe)011:556: no // gang ltar 'dod yon drug nyid chos nyid
NK103(pe)011:557: ye shes lha la lha thim pa'i don gsum rdzogs
NK103(pe)011:558: no // pa ni // snang ba snod srid pa
NK103(pe)011:559: bcud thams cad ma spangs par sems nyid du shes
NK103(pe)011:560: pas lhag pa ting nge'i mchod pa gnas su stobs
NK103(pe)011:561: no // pa ni // pa'o // mu matha'i phyogs
NK103(pe)011:562: ris su 'dzin pa'i rtog pa chos nyid kyi ngang
NK103(pe)011:563: no // pa ni // pa'o // du bsgral ba
NK103(pe)011:564: // des na don gyi gnas lugs la sbyar bas
NK103(pe)011:566: chos nyid kyi ngang las rol mo'i sgra ma 'gags par byung 0nas //
NK103(pe)011:567: de 0 yis 'gro ba'i don du blo dang 'tsham
NK103(pe)011:568: pa'i chos sgra dang rgyal ba rnams bstod dbyangs kyis
NK103(pe)011:569: rgyas par mchod pas rol mo ye shes so //
NK103(pe)011:570: mchod bshags lan gsum brjod pas cho ga'i lhag chad
NK103(pe)011:571: dam tshig gi chag nyams tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa
NK103(pe)011:573: sku dang gsung dang yon tan dang phrin las dang thugs dang //
NK103(pe)011:574: spyir bsdus te bstod pa dang drug phyi dang nang
NK103(pe)011:575: dang gsang ba dang don dang bzhi ru bstod do
NK103(pe)011:576: // dgongs su gsol ba dang mchod pa dang bshags
NK103(pe)011:577: pa dang dngos grub stsol ba dang phrin las bcol
NK103(pe)011:578: // ba rnams // ye shes can la de ltar 'dod pas smon lam gdab pa phyi dang //
NK103(pe)011:579: lte ba snying kha mgrin pa spyi bo 'khor lo
NK103(pe)011:580: bzhi ru rgyu ba'i rlung lus zungs bcud dang 'brel
NK103(pe)011:581: ba srog 'dzin shes rten snyigs ma lus kyi las
NK103(pe)011:582: byed gsum las su rung ba las //
NK103(pe)011:583: bde ba'i ye shes stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i nam mkha'i gzugs can du smon pa nang dang //
NK103(pe)011:584: gsang ba'i khams gsum rol pa'i bde gsal ngos med skye bar smon pa gsang ba dang //
NK103(pe)011:585: ma nor ma bcos pa'i ngang nyid du gnas de kho na nyid do //
NK103(pe)011:586: nyes pa'i skyon las grol ba dang legs pa'i yon tan rdzogs par //
NK103(pe)011:587: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa la bzhi sbyar ba'ang smon lam de ltar nyid do //
NK103(pe)011:588: thun mong gi sgrub pa tshe dbang dang pra la sogs nus pa la //
NK103(pe)011:589: brten nas khyad par gyi don sangs rgyas sgrub pa'am //
NK103(pe)011:590: yang na khyad par rtogs goms kyi ngang du thun mong thams cad rdzogs par gnas pas //
NK103(pe)011:591: khyad par phyi zhor la thun mong gi nus pa'i rtsal rdzogs par //
NK103(pe)011:592: bsgrub pa gang byed kyang bsnyen pa dang nye bsnyen dang sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen //
NK103(pe)011:593: po dang bzhi po lam lam gyi ni /
NK103(pe)011:597: dngos grub lam len pa'am +aa sbyar li nyams su len pa sgrub chen po /
NK103(pe)011:598: sbyor ba'i ni yum mtshan ldan rnyed nas chos bshad
NK103(pe)011:599: pa bsnyen pa byin gyis rlabs nas bde ba rgyas
NK103(pe)011:600: pa nye bsnyen phyag rgya bzhis snyoms par zhugs pa
NK103(pe)011:601: sgrub pa thig le gnas su bzlog pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:602: sgrub chen sgrub pa'i ni sgrub thabs gang byed ltar ro //
NK103(pe)011:603: dus dang sbyor ba thabs kyi dang sgrub pa dus kyi dang don dang bzhi la sbyor ro //
NK103(pe)011:604: sems dpa' rnal 'byor yo ga pa'i tshul du ye
NK103(pe)011:605: shes pa dang dam tshig pa phye nas phar 'phros
NK103(pe)011:606: pas sgrib pa sbyong ba dang dbang bskur ba dang
NK103(pe)011:608: tshur 'dus pas dngos grub nod pa dang phar mi
NK103(pe)011:609: spro bar tshur sdud pa 'ba' zhig tu bya ba
NK103(pe)011:610: dang // yab yum gyi zhal dang mkha' gsang sprad la 'phro 'du 'gal me ltar bskor bas //
NK103(pe)011:611: tshur thim pas sgrib pa sbyong ba dang phar 'phro
NK103(pe)011:612: ba'i ting nge byed pas don bde stong nyid gsal
NK103(pe)011:613: ba dang // snang 1ba grags 2pa dran 3rig gsum sku 1dang gsung 2dang 3thugs //
NK103(pe)011:614: kyi ngang du rdzogs pa'i ting nge ni phyi'i 'dzab kyi gsum tshul //
NK103(pe)011:615: rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi la rkyen gyi 'khor lo
NK103(pe)011:616: gnyis kyis bskul bas lte ba dang rtsa 'dab la
NK103(pe)011:619: rtsa dbu ma rten thig le rten can dga' ba bcu drug gi rtsa mdud dang ldan pa nas //
NK103(pe)011:620: thig le'i phreng bas 'gal me ltar bskor bzlog byas nas gsang ba'i 'dzab bzlas pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:621: lta ba rtogs 0pa dang de'i ngang du gnas nye bsnyen pa dang /
NK103(pe)011:622: de la rgyun du goms pa dang /
NK103(pe)011:623: de'i don mthar phyin sgrub chen pa bzhi ni //
NK103(pe)011:624: de kho na nyid don gyi bsnyen sgrub ste rang la gnas shing rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:625: 'dzab bskul zhing 'dzab bstod pa'ang 'dzab la yod pa de bzhin no //
NK103(pe)011:627: nangs dgong gung gnyis te thun bzhir tshogs kyis mchod pa'ang //
NK103(pe)011:628: dga' ldan lha dang 'byor ldan yo byad dang sgrub pa po //
NK103(pe)011:630: skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa //
NK103(pe)011:634: byin gyis brlab pa'i dgongs pa gtor ma'i mchod pa'i skabs su shes //
NK103(pe)011:635: ci nus su 'byor pas 'bad par bya ba yin //
NK103(pe)011:636: rnal 'byor pa dang dam tshig can gyi las byed dam can mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams la //
NK103(pe)011:637: lhag ma la kha chu bran la ci 'dod pas mchod cing bskang //
NK103(pe)011:638: phrin las bcol bshags pa bya dam tshig bsgrags //
NK103(pe)011:639: las rjes bkra shis pa'i phyir gtor ma'i cha gcig me yi las //
NK103(pe)011:640: sbyin sreg rdzogs par bya cha gcig gter du sba //
NK103(pe)011:641: cha gcig yang na bod khams zhing skyong ma skyong ba'i brtan ma mchod la 'gro drug la //
NK103(pe)011:642: mchod sbyin bya ba ni rin chen mchod sdong du dmigs la bsngo'o //
NK103(pe)011:643: dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing rtag pa'i mtha' bsal lhar bskyed la chad mtha' bsal //
NK103(pe)011:644: rgya khram gyi go cha dang khro bos lus bsrungs
NK103(pe)011:645: te dge ba'i rtsa bar 'khor gsum mi rtog pas
NK103(pe)011:646: bsngo // bkra shis gsol zhing spyod lam rgyun gyi ting nge'i ngang du gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)011:647: de yang rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK103(pe)011:648: rgyal ba'i lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin //
NK103(pe)011:649: bsgrub pa de yang gong gi de kun don phyi
NK103(pe)011:650: nang gsang ba de kho na bzhi bzhir ldan pa
NK103(pe)011:651: // ni yo ga bzhi'i dgongs pa rnal 'byor pa gcig gi lam du bkyer ba'o //
NK103(pe)011:652: lus skyed pa'i khams 'byung ba lnga la rang grol gyi rtsal zhan te rig stobs ma zhugs pas //
NK103(pe)011:653: tshe'i rgyun zad de dus su 'chi ba'am /
NK103(pe)011:654: 'chi ba'i rkyen gzhan gyis dus min par 'pho ba'i tshe na //
NK103(pe)011:655: snying gi nang gi ye shes sems dpa' sku dang /
NK103(pe)011:656: phyag mtshan gyi lte ba'i gsung thugs ka'i phyag mtshan dang gsum gsal ba la //
NK103(pe)011:657: yang dang yang du 'dris byas nas //
NK103(pe)011:658: dbugs dang sku gsung thugs der bcas pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu kun khyab par //
NK103(pe)011:659: gsal ba'i ngang du 'da' bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)011:660: gsum po de yang ting nge'i stobs chung bas ma 'chun na //
NK103(pe)011:661: sku 'am thugs mtshan nam gsung gi gzugs gsum //
NK103(pe)011:662: po gang rung gsal ba zhig mdun du bsgom pa min rang gi rig pa nyid //
NK103(pe)011:663: de la 'dris par byas la dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i kyi rta la bskyon cing bsgom //
NK103(pe)011:664: dbugs dang 'bral tshe h'u ring por nar gyis drangs pa'i rgyun de //
NK103(pe)011:665: spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga'am smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu 'am //
NK103(pe)011:666: gzugs gsal ba'i mig gi sgo'am dbugs 'byung ba'i sgo kha sna'am gang yang rung ba nas //
NK103(pe)011:667: dbugs kyi rgyun nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)011:668: 'od kyis phyogs bcu kun khyab pa'i ngang du gdal la 'ada'o //
NK103(pe)011:669: srid pa'i bar do rig pa 'od gsal langs nas dran pa rnyed pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)011:670: 'da' tshul gyi rgyun ting nge blangs te sku gsung thugs su gsal na //
NK103(pe)011:671: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi'i sa ru mthar nges par phyin te gnas pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:672: sngags te lha sgom pa'i grol sa nye lam dam pa yin no //
NK103(pe)011:673: nang steng gi sgo'i lam bsgom pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'da' ba'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)011:674: rtsa ba rten byed pas lus thig le yi ge'i
NK103(pe)011:675: dbyibs su yod pas ngag gsal bar rig pas yid
NK103(pe)011:676: // gsum po sku gsung thugs su yang yang du 'dris shing goms par gnas par byas la //
NK103(pe)011:677: de dag snying kar dril nas snying dpal gyi be'u //
NK103(pe)011:678: nyid sku gsung thugs su mtshon pa'i rtags kyi ye shes sems dpa' tshad tshon gang ba //
NK103(pe)011:679: gnad du thebs te 'chi nges nas rlung gis 'phang //
NK103(pe)011:680: 'od gsal mig gi lam nas 'thon nas ni //
NK103(pe)011:681: chos kyi dbyings kyi zhing du 'od bdal te 'da' 'o //
NK103(pe)011:682: bar dor de'i tshul blang ba ni ye shes sems
NK103(pe)011:683: dpa'i sku ru 'od kyi lus su gsal ba de
NK103(pe)011:684: bsgom // rig pa gsung du ngo sprad gsal ba'i cha thugs //
NK103(pe)011:685: kyi ngang du nga rgyal ba'i gnad du bzhugs na grol lo //
NK103(pe)011:686: 'og sgo gsang ba'i lam nyams su len pa la gnas nas 'da' ba'i tshe //
NK103(pe)011:687: rten thig le rten can bde ba dang ldan zhing ngo bos stong pa de nyid //
NK103(pe)011:688: ba thag tsam gyi rtsa dbus ma'i nang na gnas pa la shin tu 'dris par sbyang //
NK103(pe)011:689: gsang ba'i 'og min yum gyi b+ha ga'i gnas na //
NK103(pe)011:690: ston pa rdo rje 'dzin pa yab yum dag /'khril
NK103(pe)011:691: sbyor gyi bde chen dang thugs rje dang stong nyid
NK103(pe)011:692: kyi ngang // rgyun dang bcas par ting nge gsal ba'i 'od kyis khyab par mos pa byas la //
NK103(pe)011:693: rlung gis rgyu ba'i rtsa gnas spyi bo tshangs pa'i lam nas //
NK103(pe)011:694: 'thon te yab yum mkha' gsang gnyis dbyer med kyi dbyings su 'phang ba'i //
NK103(pe)011:696: bar dor rig pa langs pa'i tshe yab dang yum //
NK103(pe)011:697: chos kyi dbyings kyi zhing khams nyid //
NK103(pe)011:698: thig le la brten pa'i rang 'od bde ba sku //
NK103(pe)011:699: de ru gsal ba'i ye shes ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa'i ngang du bsgom mo //
NK103(pe)011:700: dus 'di'i tshe de dag la 'dris na grol bar the tsom med do //
NK103(pe)011:701: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i ngang du gnas pa
NK103(pe)011:702: 'dris te goms pa'i gdeng chen po dang ldan pa
NK103(pe)011:703: la // 'pho ba'i gnas dang 'thon pa'i lam la
NK103(pe)011:704: phyogs ris med par ye nas khyab gdal ba chen
NK103(pe)011:705: po la grogs mchog gam bla mas de ltar //
NK103(pe)011:706: bskul zhing rang gis goms pa las su rung ba la //
NK103(pe)011:709: 'dod pas khrid pa'i rig pa gong gi de ltar shes nas //
NK103(pe)011:710: ngang du gnas pa de grol ba ni //
NK103(pe)011:711: lta sgom gyi gnad kyis 'khrul pa rang grol nyid kyis zin nas zhes pa gsum drang /
NK103(pe)011:713: gal te gzhan tshe 'das pa dag las can snod ldan zhig yin na //
NK103(pe)011:714: rten 'brel phun sum tshogs par tshang bas bsgral ba ni //
NK103(pe)011:715: gnas 1bzang po dang sa 3gzhi legs par 2brtags 4bsnyams //
NK103(pe)011:716: gzhung bzhin byas te rdzas ma lus pa 'tshogs pa dang /
NK103(pe)011:717: sngar rigs lnga goms pa'i 'phror sbyang ngam //
NK103(pe)011:718: thugs kyi rigs kyi ngang du rigs lnga po thams cad 'du bas //
NK103(pe)011:719: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa dang 'bring po dang bsdus pa gang yang rung ba yi //
NK103(pe)011:720: gtso bo yab yum snying po h'u gnyis kyi //
NK103(pe)011:721: bar du gdul bya'i snying po n+ri ljang gu //
NK103(pe)011:722: tshe 'das rang gi dam rdzas dang thal chen las
NK103(pe)011:723: gzhi byas pa'i tshon las dal dang snying po bri
NK103(pe)011:724: // ma bsregs na phung po bsregs na rus bu
NK103(pe)011:725: de gnyis med na dri ma dang bcas pa'i gos
NK103(pe)011:727: ming rus dang ldan pa'i skyabs su gsol ba'i ngag rten mtshan byang snying kar gdags //
NK103(pe)011:728: yid kyi rten srog shing smyug ma mdangs rten me long gdugs dang 'phan phran dang //
NK103(pe)011:729: na bza' lhab lhub dang gson po'i chas ji lta bas rab tu brgyad pa'i rten de //
NK103(pe)011:730: rdul tshon gyi kha la stegs bcas la shar sgor gzhag go //
NK103(pe)011:731: zhi ba rdo rje dbyings kyi man+da la dkyil 'khor bris pa la //
NK103(pe)011:732: lha so so'i snying por ldan pa'i gtso bo yab yum gyi snying po'i bar du //
NK103(pe)011:733: tshe 'das pa'i gsang ba'i ming dang bcas pa bris te spyi bor gdags so //
NK103(pe)011:734: bum pa lto ba dang mgrin pa la sogs pa
NK103(pe)011:735: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ma nyams te gas chag
NK103(pe)011:736: med pa // dri ma dag byas rtsa ba zhabs stegs dang ldan pa bshams te //
NK103(pe)011:737: bgegs bskrad gu gul dang spos kyis bdug rtsa ba
NK103(pe)011:738: zhi ba'i lha bskyed de yan lag lha dang ldan
NK103(pe)011:739: pa la // de la ye shes spyan drang ste rab gnas bya snying po lnga sman lnga //
NK103(pe)011:740: rin chen lnga bdud rtsi lnga dri lnga 'bru lnga //
NK103(pe)011:741: ba dmar mo dang ra dkar mo'i 'o mas dgang //
NK103(pe)011:742: rten 'brel rdzas kyi nus pas 'bras bu'i rten 'brel sgrub pas na //
NK103(pe)011:743: rdzas tshang ba nyid du bya bar rab tu gces so //
NK103(pe)011:744: de yang sngags pa rtogs pa'i lta ba gsal zhing goms pa ting 'dzin brtan pa //
NK103(pe)011:745: dam tshig la gnas sam rig sngags pa grub pas bya //
NK103(pe)011:746: nye drung gshin la brtse gdung ldan pa'i rten 'brel tshang na //
NK103(pe)011:747: 'grub par 'gyur la mi ldan na nus pa chung ngo //
NK103(pe)011:748: phyi ru cha gsum gtang ste /
NK103(pe)011:749: dang pos gtsang ris 1kyi mgon po dang /
NK103(pe)011:750: bar pas 1'gro ba rigs drug la //
NK103(pe)011:751: tha mas lan chags pa la 1mchod sbyin 1sbyang //
NK103(pe)011:752: srung 'khor gyi mtshams kyis bka' bsgo ba bya smon lam gdab bden pa bdar //
NK103(pe)011:753: za 'dre gdul bar bya yi dwags khog bsrung khro bo sprul pa tshar gcad cing bgegs bskrad //
NK103(pe)011:754: don bya ba'i gnas khro bo sprul pas dgug cing rten bcas pa de dag la bstim //
NK103(pe)011:755: lcags kyu gzung zhags pas bcing lcags sgrog gis brdam dril bus bde bar gnas par bya //
NK103(pe)011:756: lan chags kyi bgegs la bla glud kyis lan chags
NK103(pe)011:757: sbyang zhing shes pa ci nas kyang khug par bya
NK103(pe)011:758: // khug nas yan lag bdun pa tshe 'das kyang byed pa'i tshul du yid kyis bzung la //
NK103(pe)011:759: byin dbab chos bzhis sgrib pa sbyang rang gi lhar
NK103(pe)011:760: bskyed 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba gsum byin dbab
NK103(pe)011:762: rdo rje rgyal po don gyi sbyongs dgongs par gnas par bya //
NK103(pe)011:763: rdo rje rgyal tshab kyis tshe 'das de yis sgrib pa sbyong zhing lhar skyed //
NK103(pe)011:764: rdo rje las mkhan gyis cho ga las kyis gzhung bsrangs nas //
NK103(pe)011:765: rdul tshon dpe chung bum par zhi khro gnyis /
NK103(pe)011:766: zhi khro'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dal gnyis te dkyil
NK103(pe)011:767: 'khor drug gi ye shes pa dang ldan pa'i sbyor
NK103(pe)011:769: gang don bya ba'i gnas tshe 'das kyi rtog tshogs
NK103(pe)011:770: lha'i dal du dag par phyi dang nang dang gsang
NK103(pe)011:771: ba'i dang don de kho na nyid du sbyang nga
NK103(pe)011:772: // de ltar thun bzhir sbyor bas ci nus tshad du 'bad do //
NK103(pe)011:773: thun mtshams su tshogs gtang lhag ma bsngosa la las la dgye //
NK103(pe)011:774: sbyin sreg me yi las pas me lha mchod //
NK103(pe)011:775: thugs rje'i sbyin pa cha gsum dus bzhir mgron gsum dagye'o //
NK103(pe)011:776: nub tha ma la rdzas dang yo byad bstar ting nge 'dzin bsgrim //
NK103(pe)011:777: thabs dang shes rab rten rdzas mda' gzhu la //
NK103(pe)011:778: gzhu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang mda' ye shes kyi khro bo bcu'i //
NK103(pe)011:779: rab gnas dang ldan pa ni sta gon du gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)011:780: gshed po 'dul ba dang glud sbyong ba drag pos thul ba'i tshad la phebs par dbab //
NK103(pe)011:781: tshe 'das kyi rten rdzas dang rig par ldan pa lug la //
NK103(pe)011:782: tshe 'das kyi shes pa bstim zhing khug ma khug gi pra blta khug pa dang //
NK103(pe)011:783: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ru tra gsum chos nyid kyi ngang du bsgral //
NK103(pe)011:784: rig pa h'u du gnas pa'i shes rab gzhu dang ye shes thabs kyi mda' gnyis kyis //
NK103(pe)011:785: gtso bo yum gyi mkha' la bsgral te made'u rtse la yi ge h'u 'am //
NK103(pe)011:786: thig le 'od lnga dang ldan pa blangs la 'og min du //
NK103(pe)011:787: sangs rgyas ni gnyis sbyor ba mdzad pa'i lhums su
NK103(pe)011:788: phata kyis 'phangs te yum gyi mkhar gdal ba la
NK103(pe)011:789: // yab yum gyi byang chub kyi sems bo d+hi
NK103(pe)011:790: tsit+tasa dbang bskur te chos sku las gzugs skur bzhengs
NK103(pe)011:791: // la // 'gro ba'i don la bskul dbu rgyan
NK103(pe)011:792: la sogs pas dbang bskur lha mo bcu gnyis dang
NK103(pe)011:793: su ra tos mchod ru lu gar gyi bros bstod
NK103(pe)011:795: de dag ting nges don la sbyar gsal 'debs kyi zhing tshig gi brdas dgrol lo //
NK103(pe)011:796: rten 'brel tshogs pa'i nus pas khyad par 'phags so //
NK103(pe)011:797: gshin gyi don phung po gter ltar du bzhugs sam sbyang mes sbyang ba'o //
NK103(pe)011:798: bzhugs na mchod rten lus gang tshad ldan pa //
NK103(pe)011:799: gru bzhi lham par byas pa'i bum par bzhugs pa'am //
NK103(pe)011:800: ri rab rmang gi khong seng byi dor zha la dang byug pa byas la //
NK103(pe)011:801: sngar rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bskur ro //
NK103(pe)011:803: rdo rje rgyal pos yan lag lnga ni //
NK103(pe)011:804: dbu kaphyag g.yas khag.yon gazhabs ngag.yas g.yon /
NK103(pe)011:806: sku kathugs khayon gatan pad+ma ngaphrin las /
NK103(pe)011:808: thugs chakar kun bzang lte jabar 'dus //
NK103(pe)011:809: mchin nyalogs g.yas par mkha' 'gro ma //
NK103(pe)011:810: 'jam ka dpal yang khadag gabdud rtsi dang //
NK103(pe)011:811: dbang nga chen rdo carje srin po'i tshogs //
NK103(pe)011:812: don chardzogs lung jamdo ma nya mo yi //
NK103(pe)011:813: de dag tu dkyil 'khor brgyad po ting nges bkod
NK103(pe)011:814: ye shes pa drang bstim mchod bstod kun byas nas
NK103(pe)011:815: // dbang phyug bdag nyid 'jug bu 'jug par gsol
NK103(pe)011:816: ba gdab de nas bu gzhug pa'i cho ga bya
NK103(pe)011:817: // ba ni // gson po dngos su 'jug pa dang bar ma do'i sems can gnyi ga'i lam //
NK103(pe)011:818: phan nus gsang dbang sher bde chen dang dbang lnga
NK103(pe)011:819: rdzogs par byas te mchod rten der bzhugs pa la
NK103(pe)011:820: // phung po srog chags 'bru dang bral thabs //
NK103(pe)011:821: ro'i phyi dang kha nas nang du bsil sman ga pur chu btab ste nang sbyangs nas //
NK103(pe)011:822: dar ram ras kyi chas kyis bsdam la ci bder gzhag go //
NK103(pe)011:823: de la nam zla dus bzhir mchod cing bstod na bkra shis byin che'o //
NK103(pe)011:824: phung po sbyangs na sa yi bya ba'i cho ga rgyas par bya //
NK103(pe)011:825: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang bsreg khang brtsig pa rnams ro bsreg gi gzhung bzhin du dgod //
NK103(pe)011:826: ro yi bya ba khrus dang dag yig la sogs pa legs par rdzogs par bya //
NK103(pe)011:827: tshe 'das rnam shes bkug cing sgrib pa sbyang pa la lhar bskyed //
NK103(pe)011:828: dbang bskur bsreg khang gi nang du rtsal la gzhag go //
NK103(pe)011:829: rdo rje rgyal pos don gyi sbyongs dgongs pa la mnyam par gnas par bya //
NK103(pe)011:830: rdo rje rgyal tshab tshogs gtang dkar byang bklags te dge ltang bsngo //
NK103(pe)011:831: las mkhan gyis me lha yi las gzhung bsrang ste //
NK103(pe)011:832: zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i phrin las rdzogs par bya //
NK103(pe)011:833: skabs sbyor bla mas nyes pa bshags shing sdig pa nag byang bklags la bsreg /
NK103(pe)011:834: me yi ltas brtags ngan na me'i skyon lnga ste /
NK103(pe)011:835: kha dog kham pa mi gsal bar 'bar na bag chags ma 'byongs pa'i rtags /
NK103(pe)011:836: sngo la rlob la me lce g.yon du 'khyil na mtho ris su mi thar /
NK103(pe)011:837: me lce g.yon thur du 'jug cing du ba dang
NK103(pe)011:838: 'dres nas 'bar na nye bzhi la mi khas 'phog
NK103(pe)011:839: / me 'phro zhing sngo nag tu 'bar na nor phyugs mi chags /
NK103(pe)011:840: me lce 'tshub cing rlung gis phyogs bcur bdag na rims yams 'ong ba'i rtags so //
NK103(pe)011:842: pa ni ngan song sbyong rgyud kyi 'grel pa las bsdus pa /
NK103(pe)011:843: me lce zlum la 'khyil ba chos kyi /
NK103(pe)011:847: me lce gyen du mi 'thor bar 'bar ba bya /
NK103(pe)011:848: ye shes lnga'i rtags te 'phags pa'i gnas skabs so //
NK103(pe)011:849: sems can gyi skabs kyi yon tan ni /
NK103(pe)011:850: kha dog dkar bar bag chags zad /
NK103(pe)011:851: g.yas su 'khyil cing 'khor ba las ldog /
NK103(pe)011:852: gyen du mtho ris su phyin /
NK103(pe)011:853: dri ma med par nye bzhi la kha nas tho ba'i skyon gyis mi gos /
NK103(pe)011:854: me lce zlum la me stag mi 'phro bar nye bzhi bkra shis /
NK103(pe)011:855: me lce brtan la glog bzhin du dri ma med la gsal bar 'bar ba ste drug go //
NK103(pe)011:856: ni nor phyugs 'phel ba'i rtags so //
NK103(pe)011:857: drag po me yi las chen brtsam //
NK103(pe)011:858: rus bu bsdus la ga'ura stsal /
NK103(pe)011:860: dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag de la shes pa dgug sgrib pa sbyang lhar bskyed //
NK103(pe)011:861: dbang bskur 'dzab bzlas pa'i dgongs pas rtog pa sbyang //
NK103(pe)011:862: tha mar rus bu brdungs la chos sku'i gzugs brnyan s+aats+tsha bzhengs //
NK103(pe)011:863: pa de rab gnas dang ldan par byas la mchod rten gyi //
NK103(pe)011:864: nang du char chus mi nyams pa'i nan tan byas la bzhugs su gsol ba la dus //
NK103(pe)011:865: skabs su mchod cing bskor ba dang bstod pa byas na //
NK103(pe)011:866: yul phyogs rnams rung bar 'gyur bkra shis dang bde legs //
NK103(pe)011:867: 'byung byed pa po ru byin rlabs dang nus mthur ldan pa ni //
NK103(pe)011:868: nyi ma shar bas mun pa sel ba dang 'dra bas //
NK103(pe)011:869: de dag la nan tan bya bar rab tu gces //
NK103(pe)011:870: 'di gzhung gi dgongs pa ma nyams par legs par rtogs na //
NK103(pe)011:871: sngar las byed pa'i phyag bzhes ma mthong ba'am mthong yang sngar gzhan gyis bsgrigs sam //
NK103(pe)011:872: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las mthong ba'i don rang gis bsgrigs pa'ang //
NK103(pe)011:873: rang gzhan mos don du bya bar gnang ba yin no //
NK103(pe)011:874: kye bod pa ho dgyes pa lha las 'dir bde bar 'ongs pa //
NK103(pe)011:875: kho bo rje dga' rab kyis rigs mthun skal ldan 'ga' 'ga' la /
NK103(pe)011:876: zhes pa la sogs pas bskul ba dang sngar gyi 'brel pas phrad //
NK103(pe)011:877: rang grol ba'i man ngag gis skabs nyi shu rtsa
NK103(pe)011:878: bdun dang rgyas bdebs pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa
NK103(pe)011:879: lnga spros pa gcod pa'i thig le drug khyad par
NK103(pe)011:881: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i //
NK103(pe)011:882: don dgrol bar bskul ba dga' rab de nyid kyis //
NK103(pe)011:883: gsungs pa'i klong gi rtsa ba nam mkha'i che'am gter gtad nyid //
NK103(pe)011:884: bkrol te bstan pa'i don sngar bshad pa de nyid yin mod //
NK103(pe)011:885: sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas su bdud rtsi yon tan gyi dngos grub grub kyang //
NK103(pe)011:886: snying po rnal ma'i don bzhed nas 'dir byon pa la gdams ngag rdzogs par gtad de bskul ba //
NK103(pe)011:887: ni bskal pa grangs med du sbyangs pa rtsol ba'i dri ma ldan pa //
NK103(pe)011:888: de snying po rnal ma ma bcos dag pa'i chus //
NK103(pe)011:889: rtsol ba'i nad de mi gnas par dag par bkru
NK103(pe)011:890: yis snying po'i don 'dod pa'i sems ma bcos par
NK103(pe)011:891: rang so'i gnyug mar zhog cig /
NK103(pe)011:892: bdud rtsi yon tan gyi rig 'dzin grub pa'i nus pa'i blo //
NK103(pe)011:893: nyid mtshan nyid rang gsal rang bzhin stong nyid rnam pa sgyu ma'i 'od //
NK103(pe)011:894: mtshon tshul ma 'dres dbyer med du rdzogs par gnas pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngang du //
NK103(pe)011:895: re dogs dang bral bar shar ba de tsam kas chog mod //
NK103(pe)011:896: byang chub sems las gzhan min pas logs su bsgoms pas 'bras bu gzhan nas ga la rnyed //
NK103(pe)011:897: byang chub kyi sems rtogs pas chos kun mkhyen //
NK103(pe)011:898: pa'i lta ba la yul shes kyi rnam ba dang
NK103(pe)011:899: bral skyon spang yon tan blang ba med par bsgom
NK103(pe)011:900: // de ltar rtsol ba dang bral ba'i ngang du gnas par ye nas grol bar rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:901: las kyi dbang gis so sor skye bas so so skye bo ste /
NK103(pe)011:902: rgyud drug gi skye ba sna tshogs dag las gcig
NK103(pe)011:903: nas gcig brgyud cing sngon yang skyes shing da ltar
NK103(pe)011:904: yang skye dang phyis kyang skye bar 'gyur te skye
NK103(pe)011:905: ba'i rgyun mi 'chad gyi skye ba'i dbang du song
NK103(pe)011:906: bas // sems kyi rtog pa 'di nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' mi shes pas /
NK103(pe)011:907: log pa'i rtog pa rgyun mi 'chad pas bslus shing
NK103(pe)011:908: log pa'i rtog pa'i rgyun ma chad par 'brangs te
NK103(pe)011:909: / 'khrul pa'i rtog pa las phyir ldog pa med
NK103(pe)011:910: cing yang dag pa'i don shes par gyur pa ni
NK103(pe)011:911: / / dper na sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag gis
NK103(pe)011:912: sgyu ma'i ltad mo rnams rta glang 'dra bar sgyu
NK103(pe)011:913: mar rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams //
NK103(pe)011:914: rmi lam gyi slad kyis bslad pa'i rmi lam pa
NK103(pe)011:915: bzhin du rmi yis bden pa nyams shing rmi lam
NK103(pe)011:916: dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa 'dra'o //
NK103(pe)011:917: gong du ji ltar bstan pa'i lam 'di spong zhing
NK103(pe)011:918: theg pa 'di'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du ma
NK103(pe)011:919: lcogs te mtha' ru lhung ba'i skyon dang ldan pa
NK103(pe)011:920: dang theg pa 'di'i lam gzhan du gyur pa lta
NK103(pe)011:921: ba sna tshogs kyi lam du bltas nas ma nor
NK103(pe)011:924: de dag ni dper na rdo la ni gser zhes
NK103(pe)011:925: zer gser la rdo zhes zer nas ngo ma shes
NK103(pe)011:926: pa bzhin du thugs rjer rung zhing 'phags pa thugs
NK103(pe)011:927: rje chen po mnga' ba rnams kyis kye ma'o thugs
NK103(pe)011:928: rjes dper na yid du 'ong ba'i yul la sems
NK103(pe)011:929: g.yengs te 'jug la rang dbang med pa la /
NK103(pe)011:931: yid phrogs zhes brjod pa dang 'dra bar rang dbang
NK103(pe)011:932: med par gdung ba skye ba la phrogs pa zhes
NK103(pe)011:934: shes rab kyi blo shin tu ma sbyangs pas dus
NK103(pe)011:935: kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la
NK103(pe)011:936: // chos la spyod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
NK103(pe)011:937: pa'i gsung rab ma nor ba dri ma med par
NK103(pe)011:938: bstan pa'i don rtogs par dka' ba dag la ji
NK103(pe)011:939: skad bstan pa'i sgra bzhin du dpyad cing 'dzin kyang
NK103(pe)011:940: don gyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa
NK103(pe)011:941: min te dper na sgron mas gser btsal kyang sgron
NK103(pe)011:942: ma gser min pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)011:943: rang gi 'khrul pa'i blo gros kyi stobs kyis rang
NK103(pe)011:944: dga' ba bzhin du don dpyod pa la 'jug pa
NK103(pe)011:945: la sogs pa'i phyin ci log gi lta ba sna
NK103(pe)011:947: mi shes ba'i lta ba'i chu bos g.yengs shing khyer
NK103(pe)011:948: bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'i don gyi gsung
NK103(pe)011:949: gi nying khu gsung rab bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba
NK103(pe)011:950: la ma nor bar rnal du 'byor zhing sgom pa
NK103(pe)011:952: de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i lam mchog thugs kyi
NK103(pe)011:953: gsang ba dam pa yang dag pa'i don 'di la
NK103(pe)011:954: // kun tu rgyal ba kun gyi ji ltar mkhyen
NK103(pe)011:955: pa'i spyod yul ltar slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
NK103(pe)011:956: gyis mkhyen pa ma lags pas thun mong ma yin
NK103(pe)011:957: // yang // slob dpon nyid kyis yun ring du
NK103(pe)011:958: goms par byas te bsgoms pa'i mthu dang lung man
NK103(pe)011:959: ngag gi tshad ma dag gis gtan la phab pa
NK103(pe)011:960: yis sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang mi 'gal tsam du
NK103(pe)011:961: tshad ma dag las rab tu bsgrigs //
NK103(pe)011:962: 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis pa 'di ni sangs
NK103(pe)011:963: rgyas rnams kyi gshegs shul lam mchog 'di ni ma
NK103(pe)011:964: nor bstan cing rab bsdus pas //
NK103(pe)011:965: skye bo sems can thams cad kyi skye ba'i gnas
NK103(pe)011:966: dang dus gsum thams cad du yang skad cig tsam
NK103(pe)011:967: kyang // mi mthun phyogs thams cad kyis yang dag
NK103(pe)011:968: pa'i bsam pa mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi thugs
NK103(pe)011:969: su chud pa'i don gyi snying po 'di sems can
NK103(pe)011:970: thams cad kyis rtogs shing rab tu rgyas par shog
NK103(pe)011:971: cig ces bsngosa pa yin no //
NK103(pe)011:972: byang chub kyi sems gnas lugs rang gi gter don
NK103(pe)011:973: lam gtad pa dran pa rgyun du longs spyod pa
NK103(pe)011:974: thob pa 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i man ngag
NK103(pe)011:975: nges par gsum ka tshig lam lung bstan pa zhes
NK103(pe)011:976: bya ba / bram ze bde gsang mtshan stsal gsal /
NK103(pe)011:977: bram ze snying po grub pa /
NK103(pe)011:979: de wa a mri ta d+harma sid+d+hi'i don du mdzad
NK103(pe)011:980: pa 'di thugs la brnag pa'i phyir theg pa shan
NK103(pe)011:981: 'byed du dgongs pa dang bcas pa /
NK103(pe)011:982: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ba ta dang /
NK103(pe)011:983: zhu chen gyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro
NK103(pe)011:984: tsa nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus
NK103(pe)011:985: shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:986: zhabs su dbas sgom rdo rje rgyal mtshan la bskul te gtad pa'o //
NK103(pe)011:987: 'di rgya che la gting zab pas rtogs par dka' la /
NK103(pe)011:988: sgro skur gyi gzhi che ba lags pas /
NK103(pe)011:989: rang gi snying dang 'dra ba 'ga' las mang na /
NK103(pe)011:990: slob dpon de yis 'di'i bstan pa bshig pa yin no //
